Package it.polimi.GC13.model

Class Table

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.GC13.model.Table
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Table extends Object implements Serializable
Table class represents the game table, storing available cards and player scores.
See Also:

      Gets a card from the table by its serial number.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a map of serial numbers and their visibility status.

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(PlayableCard cardToDraw) throws GenericException
      Draws a card from the table.
      Parameters:
      cardToDraw - the card to draw.
      Throws:
      GenericException - if the card is not found in any deck.
